name: AttackTerminal
description:
How to play:

Your goal is the get the goal (green circle) while avoiding the attack zones(red rectangles)! If you get hit 5 time you die, in addition if you run out of time before you get to the goal and advance to the next round you die too. Health is the top center display of X's directly below it time left is shown. Your score is seen on the top left with your best score directly below it! Your time to score 10 points is seen on the top left with your best right below it!

Controls:

Just Move Around The Mouse!

Credits:

A 4466 game!

Made in Pygame! Font from TinyWorlds on itch.io!
